name: Pirates of Gensokyo
description:
A short visual novel about 4 girls, one of which will discover who they are.
Marisa rounds up a  most unlikely crew, in search of adventure, and of course, treasure! Interpersonal conflict ensues among the crew, but in the end their stark differences bring clarity in their personal lives.

The real treasure is the one you find within yourself!

Featuring: Marisa, Sanae, Alice, and Satori

Project Lead: ApricotWTF

Writers: Rinzai VividGlo

CoWriter: ApricotWTF

Orginal Music by: Rinzai, VividGlo

Code: OwO, VividGlo, ApricotWTF

Orginal Art by : AJ
